Articles.Content:
![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)**!!Videos only!!**![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (Because why spend hours trying to understand something when you can be shown)

Just thought I'd do a Thread for 'Kerbal Video Modding Tutorials' as I find it hard to locate good/any videos detailing how certain things are done.

This Forum will be Videos only but there is a link at the bottom for all others.

\* = Last Added

**------------------------------------------------------------------------**

[Run KSP in half the normal memory using OpenGL mode!](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=ksp+code&page=2) ; Works for 0.25/1.0.4

**------------------------------------------------------------------------**

I would still like to get videos for: Science, Lighting, Biomes, Object Import Direction info (what X,Y,Z should face where for easy node\_attach)

and anything else that will help the community make the Kerbal Universe bigger.

I'll also list better details as I watch and re-watch them.

**------------------------------------------------------------------------**

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Please post anything new and feel free to make your own videos ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

 Also if you believe a video is useful to certain versions of KSP please tell me and I'll put a thing beside it.

\*Will keep modifying this Forum bit by bit day by day until it is 100% user friendly\*

If you cant find something [This Forum](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE) should have you covered, tho most of the tutorials are Text/Pictures.

>If you made the Video I can add your name if you want, I remember someone commented on there Wheel tutorial mistype but can't remember(old thread)<

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-13T14:43:24Z" title="09/13/2015 02:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 13, 2015</time> by Lt Vax**

Just thought I'd share my **EEK2 Electric Motor**, used the ****

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vrmyEgu6sMI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 tutorial to achieve it, all tho the tutorial has no audio it dose cover what you need in text.
Had a slight bug with the Propeller spinning the wrong way but I just put it inside a game object facing the thrust direction.

![EEK2%20Final%20Flight.png~original](http://i128.photobucket.com/albums/p196/vax27/EEK2%20Final%20Flight.png~original)
